dcterms:description: The dataset contains 93 video sequences belonging to 10 human actions performed by 9 different actors. The actions include bend, jump, jack, jump forward on two legs, jump in place on two legs, run, gallop sideways, skip, walk, wave two hands, and wave one hand. All video sequences have a resolution of 180x144 pixels and a length of four seconds with an average of 50 fps.
dcterms:title: Benchmark Dataset
